get.description: Retrieve all sales orders, optionally filtered by status and/or customer ID.

post.description: Create a new sales order with multiple items.

get.description: Retrieve full order details including items, production, delivery, and billing.

patch.description: Update order status (e.g., admin override or cancel).

get.description: List all production orders, optionally filtered by status.

post.description: Start production for a given sales order.

patch.description: Mark a production order as 'In Progress'.
Mark production complete and update related sales order.

get.description: List deliveries, optionally filtered by status.

patch.description: Mark delivery as completed and update sales order.

post.description: Generate a billing record after delivery.

get.description: Retrieve full product catalog, optionally filtered by keyword.
List all customers, with optional search.
